argumentText:
ARGUMENT
w

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | caofref.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 2 |  | caofref.2 | |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) |
| 3 |  | caofref.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. S ) -> x R x ) |
| 4 | 2 | #P_ffvelrnda | |- ( ( ph /\ w e. A ) -> ( F ` w ) e. S ) |
| 5 | 3 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ph -> A. x e. S x R x ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ w e. A ) -> A. x e. S x R x ) |
| 7 |  | #P_id | |- ( x = ( F ` w ) -> x = ( F ` w ) ) |
| 8 | 7, 7 | #P_breq12d | |- ( x = ( F ` w ) -> ( x R x <-> ( F ` w ) R ( F ` w ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_rspcv | |- ( ( F ` w ) e. S -> ( A. x e. S x R x -> ( F ` w ) R ( F ` w ) ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 6, 9 | #P_sylc | |- ( ( ph /\ w e. A ) -> ( F ` w ) R ( F ` w ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ph -> A. w e. A ( F ` w ) R ( F ` w ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( F : A --> S -> F Fn A ) |
| 13 | 2, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> F Fn A ) |
| 14 |  | #P_inidm | |- ( A i^i A ) = A |
| 15 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( ph /\ w e. A ) -> ( F ` w ) = ( F ` w ) ) |
| 16 | 13, 13, 1, 1, 14, 15, 15 | #P_ofrfval | |- ( ph -> ( F oR R F <-> A. w e. A ( F ` w ) R ( F ` w ) ) ) |
| 17 | 11, 16 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ph -> F oR R F ) |
